title: K\"ahler manifolds with positive first Chern class and mirrors of rigid Calabi-Yau manifolds
abstract: Recent work on the relation between a special class of K\"ahler manifolds with positive first Chern class and critical N$=$2 string vacua with c$=$9 is reviewed and extended. (Based on a talk presented at the International Workshop on Supersymmetry and Unification of Fundamental Interactions (SUSY 93), Boston, MA, March 1993)
